DexDrive, SharkPort/X-Port, Max Drive Information
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): DexDrive, SharkPort/X-Port, Max Drive Information
This section is tech support for the devices used to hold our Tournaments.


*DexDrive: for Playstation, PSone (MR1 &2)

*Max Drive, SharkPort, X-Port: For Playstation 2 Games (MR4 & MR3)

Max Drive is the preferred device for entering MR4 events, it works on all PS2 models.
SharkPort & XPort only work on older PS2's.

Please note that PS3 players can transfer saves to PS1 and PS2 memory cards with the Sony memory card adapter, and then use a Dex Drive, MaxPort, etc.
  • DexDrive Information: September 2 - 09:45 am

  • X-Port/Sharkport Information October 30 - 07:03 am

  • Max Drive Information July 10 - 11:38 am

  • Public Questions: DexDrive, SharkPort/X-Port, Max Drive Inquries September 6 - 04:49 pm
